categories.description: 📦 Basic everyday stuff like help and info commands. You know, the boring but useful ones.
🎉 Useless but entertaining chaos. Perfect for wasting time with friends.

meta.shortDescription: 😵‍💫 You seriously need help already? Fine.
meta.longDescription: Displays a list of all available commands along with their descriptions, so you can easily understand what the bot can do and how to use each command.
Fetches the top definition for a word or phrase from Urban Dictionary and shows it in a fancy embed. Perfect for when someone says something you *pretend* to understand.
